top_comments_top.body:
Good question, i'd personally go w ratchet and clank for personal taste

As long as you don't go w FIFA tho both will be really good choices

Controversial but if you really want to get more bang for your buck in terms of hours and playtime, Far Cry 6.

If you want a short but more memorable experience, Ratchet.
You looking to play strictly solo or possibly some multi-player? Far Cry is fun solo and you can play your campaign then join a friend's to help them. It keeps each players' campaign data seperate.

I played Ratchet and had a blast but I completed the game in a week.  Not sure you can do that with Far Cry.  I guess I'd you want a game you can finish Ratchet, if you want a game that will go on and on, Far Cry
